text: Claudia Sturm (born 27 September 1962) is a German handball player who played for the West German national team. She was born in Heppenheim. She represented West Germany at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, where the West German team placed fourth. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Hesse Category:German female handball players Category:Olympic handball players of West Germany Category:Handball players at the 1984 Summer Olympics
title: Claudia Sturm
